metadata.title: CVE-2019-20161 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and 0.9.0-development-20191109. There is heap-based buffer overflow in the function ReadGF_IPMPX_WatermarkingInit() in odf/ipmpx_code.c.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
